verses.verse: How amiable<WH3039> are your tabernacles<WH4908>, O Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>!
My soul<WH5315> longs<WH3700>, Yes<WH3615>, even faints for the courts<WH2691> of the Lord<WH3068>: my heart<WH3820> and my flesh<WH1320> cries out<WH7442> for the living<WH2416> God<WH410>.

Yes<WH6833>, the sparrow has found<WH4672> a house<WH1004>, and the swallow<WH1866> a nest<WH7064> for herself<WH7896>, where she may lay her young<WH667>, even your altars<WH4196>, O Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, my King<WH4428>, and my God<WH430>.
Blessed<WH835> are they that live<WH3427> in your house<WH1004>: they will be still praising<WH1984> you<WH5542>. Selah.
Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> whose strength<WH5797> is in you<WH3824>; in whose heart are the ways of them<WH4546>.
Who passing<WH5674> through the valley<WH6010> of Baca<WH1056> make<WH7896> it a well<WH4599>; the rain<WH4175> also fills<WH5844> the pools<WH1293>.
They go<WH3212> from strength<WH2428> to strength<WH2428>, every one of them in Zion<WH6726> appeared<WH7200> before God<WH430>.
O Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, hear<WH8085> my prayer<WH8605>: give ear<WH238>, O God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290>. Selah<WH5542>.
Behold<WH7200>, O God<WH430> our shield<WH4043>, and look<WH5027> upon the face<WH6440> of your anointed<WH4899>.

For a day<WH3117> in your courts<WH2691> is better<WH2896> than a thousand<WH505>. I had rather<WH977> be a doorkeeper<WH5605> in the house<WH1004> of my God<WH430>, than to live<WH1752> in the tents<WH168> of wickedness<WH7562>.

For the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> is a sun<WH8121> and shield<WH4043>: the Lord<WH3068> will give<WH5414> grace<WH2580> and glory<WH3519>: no good<WH2896> thing will he withhold<WH4513> from them that walk<WH1980> uprightly<WH8549>.
O Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> that trusts in you<WH982>.
